projects.description: This random quote generator shows a new quote every 10 seconds. The background color will also change. A new quote can also be called via button
The object was to add a pagination to a user list with filter possibility. Each page shoes 10 user. The filter acts instance when a key is pressed.
This project shows a form with the validation via jQuery. All required fields have a live validation with a message, if the input is not valid.
This is a JavaScript game with the object to learn object oriented programming. The user can start the game and guess a phrase via the keyboard or the buttons on the screen.

The task was to load 12 users via https://randomuser.me API and generate UserCards from them. If you click on a user, further information is displayed in a modal. In the modal you can switch the users with the back and forth buttons. The search field let you search for a specific user.
